data.name: Bulwark
data.description: Have great survivability and can provide buffs for the team, usually have the ability to counterattack.

data.name: Vanguard
data.description: Have exceptional mobility and high burst damage, ideal for flanking enemies.

data.name: Support
data.description: Enhance the team's survivability or damage output depending on the individual Doll's specialties, which may include: ability to deal high stability damage, support attacks, healing, stability regen, damage buffs, cleanse and so on.

data.name: Sentinel
data.description: Has high damage output and can deal large amounts of targeted or AoE damage, depending on the individual Doll's specialties. They are the core of the team's offensive power.
